channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff Sale
channel.desc: Tune in to bag great savings on fantastic White Stuff fashion. We've got a wide range of comfy and stylish White Stuff apparel available at Sale prices - don't miss out.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion Sale
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off My Garden Stories
channel.desc: Up to 50% off My Garden Stories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: de Jager Bulbs & Plants
channel.desc: First established over 150 years ago, join reputable gardening brand de Jager as they share high quality plants and bulbs in all shapes and sizes, to help you create your dream outdoor space.
